defend() - Method in class fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player
Respond to an accusation, revealing the player's identity or playing a Witch? effect. If the player has no cards with playable witch effects left, they are Player.forcedReveal() forced to reveal their identity.
DefenseAction - Enum Class in fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players
This enum represents the possible actions a player can perform when they are accused or targetted by a Hunt! effect.
DefenseAction() - Constructor for enum class fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.DefenseAction
 
DefensiveStrategy - Class in fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies
This strategy will be chosen by the CPUPlayer when they feel threatened : If the game is tied, if the leading players are far above in score, if this player has no cards left, or if this player plays as a witch and is not close to victory.
DefensiveStrategy() - Constructor for class fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies.DefensiveStrategy
This strategy will : + Be more stingy on spending cards + Be less picky on cards and effects + Consider the game is tight easier
